actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for nondiscriminatory reimbursement practices of the Social Security Administration in connection with utilization review of Medicare patients and to provide for fair reimbursement for carrying out such activities.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require that the charge to a provider of services under such title for the costs of utilization review shall be calculated without apportioning such costs among the non-Medicare patients of such provider.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for nondiscriminatory reimbursement practices of the Social Security Administration in connection with utilization review of Medicare patients and to provide for fair reimbursement for carrying out such activities.
